title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Strategies for Advanced Mathematics Education Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more mathematics problem-solving strategies contextually in mobile environments
Learners can analyze five or more practical cases per week using learning object-based microlearning modules
Learners can simulate mathematics problem-solving processes using collaboration tools and digital resources in BYOD environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
